edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol

Interface SigmaSimulator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SigmaANDSimulator, SigmaCramerShoupEncryptedValueSimulator, SigmaDHExtendedSimulator, SigmaDHExtendedStatisticalSimulator, SigmaDHSimulator, SigmaDJEncryptedValueSimulator, SigmaDJEncryptedZeroSimulator, SigmaDJKnowledgeSimulator, SigmaDJProductSimulator, SigmaDlogSimulator, SigmaElGamalCmtKnowledgeSimulator, SigmaElGamalCommittedValueSimulator, SigmaElGamalEncryptedValueSimulator, SigmaElGamalPrivateKeySimulator, SigmaORMultipleSimulator, SigmaORTwoSimulator, SigmaPedersenCmtKnowledgeSimulator, SigmaPedersenCommittedValueSimulator

    public interface SigmaSimulator
    General interface for Sigma Protocol Simulator.

    The simulator is a probabilistic polynomial-time function, that on input x and challenge e outputs a transcript of the form (a, e, z) with the same probability distribution as transcripts between the honest prover and verifier on common input x.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)
